 C-27.1  - Municipal Code of Québec 
 Schedule XXVI Versions 
 Full text  
 Show all versions  
 Hide all versions  
 In force date 
 1999-04-01 
  Show full text at this date
 REPEAL SCHEDULE In accordance with section 17 of the Act respecting the consolidation of the statutes and regulations (chapter R-3), the Québec Municipal Code (1916), in force on 1 January 1984, is repealed, except articles 2, 6, 16 b , 133, 773, and Title XXXI, including articles 831 and 832, effective from the coming into force of chapter C-27.1 of the Revised Statutes.
